game.name: Rizline
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 창작마당, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, Steam Cloud, 통계, 레벨 에디터 포함, 가족 공유, Steam 타임라인
game.shortDescription: Rhythm connects! Dive into a mesmerizing journey where points and lines dance in harmony, weaving an extraordinary geometric tapestry set to the innermost beat of your heart!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Rhythm connects! Dive into a mesmerizing journey where points and lines dance in harmony, weaving an extraordinary geometric tapestry set to the innermost beat of your heart!
